title: Main pitfalls for CRO Agencies when working with clients, with Ricardo Tayar López (Flat101)
description:
This week we learn about the main pitfalls agencies encounter when working on CRO projects and how to prevent them.

Shownotes: https://www.cro.cafe/podcast/main-pitfalls-for-cro-agencies-when-working-with-clients
